change.changenote: Section 3 (2) BEFORE amended by 2001-43-14, effective August 27, 2001 (Royal Assent).

subsection.subsectiontext: The registrar must not accept a regulation for deposit until the registrar is satisfied that it has been examined by a person referred to in section 2.

change.changenote: Section 11 (2) (a.1) BEFORE amended by 2001-43-15, effective August 27, 2001 (Royal Assent).

paragraph.paragraphtext: specifying the circumstances in which the registrar is prohibited from accepting a regulation for deposit until a regulatory impact statement is submitted in accordance with the policies and procedures established under the Regulatory Impact Statement Act.

change.changenote: Section 11 (2) (b) BEFORE amended by 2001-43-15, effective August 27, 2001 (Royal Assent).
